content:
I do not have access to target's current partnerships with non-profit organizations. however, historically, target has had many successful partnerships with deserving non-profit organizations. these partnerships have enabled target to positively impact local communities and support organizations that align with its values and mission.

one example of target's successful partnership is with st. jude children's research hospital, a leading pediatric treatment and research facility. target has been partnering with st. jude for over fifteen years, providing financial support and organizing various fundraising initiatives. together, they have raised millions of dollars for research and treatment of childhood cancer and other diseases. 

another successful partnership is with the united way. target has been a significant contributor to the united way campaign for many years, donating millions of dollars to support education, financial stability, and health programs in local communities.

in addition, target has also partnered with the american red cross, contributing large sums of money and providing emergency resources during disasters such as hurricanes, tornadoes, and wildfires.

these are just a few examples of target's many successful partnerships with non-profit organizations. through these partnerships, target has been able to make a positive impact on local communities and support organizations that align with its values and mission.
